text.jpText:
ライブのレッスンで『観客は気にする相手
じゃなくて、自分を鼓舞してくれる味方だ』
って教わったんだけどさ……。
text.enText:
In my live performance lessons, I was taught 
that the audience is not someone you care 
about, but an ally who inspires you. I was 
taught that the audience is not someone to 
care about, but an ally who inspires you. ……

text.jpText:
頭ではわかってても、見られてるって
感じがやっぱりダメで……はぁ。
text.enText:
Even though I know it in my head, the feeling 
of being watched is still no good. ……

text.jpText:
いっそ、観客が見えなくなるくらい
照明を落として真っ暗にするとか――
text.enText:
Or maybe we could just dim the lights so low 
that the audience can't see them.

text.jpText:
いや、全部忘れて、なんでもない。
やっぱり自分が変わらなきゃ……！
text.enText:
No, forget all that, it's nothing. I still 
have to change myself. ……!
